Articles.Content:
[imgur]DlJv0[/imgur]
The Swiftwing is an air dominance fighter, with amazing maneuverability. She is very unstable, but very fast. Her maneuverability is so great that you have to feather the pitch up key in the corners, because otherwise she can flatspin. With 3 engines, twin panthers and a whiplash, she can easily outrun enemy fighters. At her maximum speed of mach 2.75 in the upper atmosphere, she can even intercept most high speed bombers. With a low stall speed of 50 m/s, the Swiftwing is exceedingly maneuverable. Be careful upon takeoff, and make sure to engage the panther engines to keep the plane mostly stable. At low altitudes, her speed is limited only by heat capacity, and with a rather long fuel load of 1.5 hours at altitude with full throttle, she can patrol for long periods of time. Of course, she can also go for maximum speed and hit mach 4 at medium altitude.
[TABLE="class: grid, width: 500"]
[TR]
[TD]Name:[/TD]
[TD]Swiftwing Air Dominance Fighter[/TD]
[/TR]
[TR]
[TD]Max Speed:[/TD]
[TD]Mach 4 at 10000-18000 meters[/TD]
[/TR]
[TR]
[TD]Max Altitude:[/TD]
[TD]25000 meters[/TD]
[/TR]
[TR]
[TD]Armament:[/TD]
[TD]4 Missile Racks, 1 Vulcan 20 mm cannon w/ 1 ammo box[/TD]
[/TR]
[/TABLE]

[TABLE="class: grid, width: 500"]
[TR]
[TD]Action Group 1:[/TD]
[TD]Toggle JX-4 Whiplash[/TD]
[/TR]
[TR]
[TD]Action Group 2:[/TD]
[TD]Toggle J-404 Panther[/TD]
[/TR]
[TR]
[TD]Action Group 3:[/TD]
[TD]Toggle Mode of J-404 Panther[/TD]
[/TR]
[TR]
[TD]Action Group 4:[/TD]
[TD]Next Weapon[/TD]
[/TR]
[TR]
[TD]Action Group 5:[/TD]
[TD]Fire[/TD]
[/TR]
[TR]
[TD]Action Group 6:[/TD]
[TD]Release Chaff[/TD]
[/TR]
[TR]
[TD]Action Group 7:[/TD]
[TD]Release Flares[/TD]
[/TR]
[/TABLE] Edited November 16, 2015 by Alphasus
